objects.description: [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) has used VPS hosting providers for infrastructure outside of Russia.(Citation: unit42_gamaredon_dec2022)(Citation: ESET Gamaredon Sept2024)(Citation: Huntio_GamaredonFlux_Apr2025)
